body_html:
Hello both
Thank you both for your replies - both really helpful in different ways. The tutorial is very instructive - gives lots to work with. The insight into current state of play on seq2seq helps to inform my next steps - I think I will come back to this assignment when it is released.
Thanks again.

body:
Hello both
Thank you both for your replies - both really helpful in different ways.  The tutorial is very instructive - gives lots to work with.   The insight into current state of play on seq2seq helps to inform my next steps - I think I will come back to this assignment when it is released.  
Thanks again.
